actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the national program for traumatic brain injury surveillance and registries.
short_title: Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr. Traumatic Brain Injury Program Renaming Act

summary.text:
Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr. Traumatic Brain Injury Program Renaming Act

This bill renames the National Program for Traumatic Brain Injury Surveillance and Registries as the Bill Pascrell, Jr., National Program for Traumatic Brain Injury Surveillance and Registries.

titles.title: Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr. Traumatic Brain Injury Program Renaming Act
Congressman Bill Pascrell, Jr. Traumatic Brain Injury Program Renaming Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act with respect to the national program for traumatic brain injury surveillance and registries.
